mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.bookname AS "bookname", a.bookid AS "bookid", a.bookpic AS "bookpic", a.chapterid AS "chapterid", a.userid AS "userid", a.date AS "date", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO history( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, bookname, bookid, bookpic, chapterid, userid, date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{bookname}, #{bookid}, #{bookpic}, #{chapterid}, #{userid}, #{date}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE history SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, bookname = #{bookname}, bookid = #{bookid}, bookpic = #{bookpic}, chapterid = #{chapterid}, userid = #{userid}, date = #{date}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
